name: 洪祖全
objective: 課程內容包括基本熱力學、基本熱力循環、基本流體力學、基本熱傳理論的複習。經由兩個演講方式主題的開場，讓學生知道這們課與以前學過的課程有哪些相關，以便學習過程的吸收可以更具體。除了基本化石燃料的傳統電廠介紹以外，因應全球氣候變遷，核能在全球普遍被重新重視並快速成長，所以本課程也加重既有以及第四代各式核能反應器與發電之比重。廢熱回收與複循環之廣義汽電共生的概念，對於節能減碳也是相當重要的。再生能源雖對於整體能源的比重不大，但它們的乾淨與對環境的貢獻，也是本課程重視的。除此也定出數個題目，讓同學可以分組實作，提升興趣，減少考試之壓力。
schedule:
1.　　Presentation to an advanced topic in energy application
2.　　Presentation to an advanced topic in energy application
3.　　Introduction to nuclear powered systems: fission typed plants (basic principles)
4.　　Introduction to nuclear powered systems: fission typed plants (applications)
5.　　Presentation in thermal science and energy engineering and discussion to the topic study
6.　　Review of thermodynamics and thermodynamic cycles
7.　　Review of fundamental heat transfer, fluid flow
8.　　Introduction to the fossil powered plants
9.　　Introduction to fast breeder and 4th generation of nuclear reactors
10.　　Nuclear energy and hydrogen economy
11.　　Progress presentation of the topic study 
12.　　Cogeneration - waste heat recovery and combined cycle
13.　　Cogeneration - waste heat recovery and combined cycle
14.　　Renewable energy
15.　　Green building concept
16.　　CO2 topic and environment concerns
17.　　Final presentation and demonstration of the topic study – Oral and Poster
18.　　Final examination
scorePolicy:
出席：30%
考試與實作報告：70%
materials:
講義
能源應用與原動力廠，蘇燈城著，全華科技圖書
